title: This Mini Milk Crate Coozie Drink Holder is Genius!
content:
We love finding unique cycling goods on Etsy and these Mini Milk Crate Coozie Drink Holders are super fun. They’re designed to perfectly hold a bike bottle or can (size dependent). They’re available in six colors and two sizes: bike bottle or can. The Mini Milk Crate Coozie is 3D printed from premium materials that balance durability and weight to help you keep your ride and vibes chill.

Check ’em out at Etsy.

The post This Mini Milk Crate Coozie Drink Holder is Genius! appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
